universal.value: There are no known active users.

We will have to check the given address before we are able to change the database entry. A confirmation e-Mail has been send to your account. Please follow the given link to complete this task. Your new e-Mail address has been saved temporarily in our database.
The e-Mail address has been changed successfully.
A link has been sent to you via e-Mail. Please use this link to confirm the delivery of your message. The message and your sender information have been saved temporarily in the system.
The message has been send successfully.
A new password has been assigned successfully using a valid security ID. The new valid access information have been sent to your e-Mail address.
Your language settings have been updated successfully.

reset.html: All "new" markers have been removed successfully.
reset.text: All "new" markers have been removed successfully.

universal.value: You have been logged in successfully.
You have been logged out successfully.
A link has been sent to you via e-Mail. Please use this link to confirm the changed password. Your new password has been saved temporarily in the system.
The defined member has been deleted successfully.
A new password has been assigned successfully and an e-Mail was sent to the member.
The changed member information have been saved successfully.
A new security ID has been assigned successfully and an e-Mail was sent to the member.
A link has been sent to you via e-Mail. Please use this link to confirm your account registration. Your account information have been saved temporarily in the system.
Other users are allowed to send e-Mails to you
Send an e-Mail to the member
The security ID has been used. Therefore a new password has been assigned to your account. The new valid access information has been listed below.
Currently no groups have been defined.

Every e-Mail address between 5 and 255 characters will be accepted by the system if the address or domain has not been blocked by the administration. Please note that only one account is allowed per e-Mail address.
The administration defined a minimal length of

characters for the password. The more characters you use, the more secure is your password. We recommend additionally to mix numbers and special characters with your password and not to use your user name or any part of your e-Mail address.

secid.html: A security ID has been given to you after registering an account or using the &quot;Forgotten password&quot; option. As previously mentioned it is now required to reset your password.
secid.text: A security ID has been given to you after registering an account or using the "Forgotten password" option. As previously mentioned it is now required to reset your password.

universal.value: Please note that usernames are case sensitive.
User names are valid with a length between
and 100 characters. Letters, numbers and spaces are allowed. Additionally you can use the following characters: ! $ % / ( ) { } [ ] ? @ * ~ # , . - ; _
Please note that this list will not be viewable again.
A new password has been assigned to your account. The new valid access information have been listed below.
We recommend to change the password as soon as possible.
Other users are allowed to access the RealLife data
Please note that you will receive an e-Mail to check your e-Mail address. You will have to use the given vID there to activate your account.

We want to welcome you once more on behalf of the whole team. If you have questions about available options please have a look at the voluminous help. This private messaging system is likewise available for you. A new message can be written using the function of the same name. Please note that you can only receive an defined amount of messages.

A new 96 characters long security ID was assigned to your account. Once you will be able to reset your password using this ID. Please keep this ID in a safe place and delete this e-Mail as soon as possible.
There are currently no registered users in our database.
please click the following link as confirmation. Your message will be send with your e-Mail address as sender to the recipient.
Please visit the following URL to confirm the change and that your new e-Mail address is working probertly.
To change your password, please use the link given in this e-Mail. This step should ensure, that a third party is unable to change your account password even if the account has been compromised.
To complete the account registration you will have to click the following link.
The defined e-Mail address or domain has been blocked by the administration and can not be used.
The defined e-Mail address does already exist in our database.
The specified group ID is invalid.
The defined security ID for the account differs from that one in our database or it has been used but not renewed.
Please log in on the external service to log in here.
The log in procedure for the external service has expired. Unfortunately we are unable to complete your log in successfully.
Please complete the log in procedure of the external service before accessing this restricted function.

required.html: You have to accept the "Terms Of Use" (TOU) to continue your registration.
required.text: You have to accept the "Terms Of Use" (TOU) to continue your registration.

universal.value: The defined user name has been blocked by the administration. According to the Terms Of Use you are no longer allowed to use the provided services.
The defined user name does already exist in our database.

invalid.html: The defined user name contains characters that are not allowed. Allowed characters are 0-9, a-z, A-Z as well as the following symbols: !\$%&/(){[]}?@*~#,.-;_
invalid.text: The defined user name contains characters that are not allowed. Allowed characters are 0-9, a-z, A-Z as well as the following symbols: !\$%&/(){[]}?@*~#,.-;_

universal.value: The defined user name has been locked by the administration or the system.
